title: The Turning point
creator_credit: Hera Productions, Herbert Ross and Arthur Laurents
brief_description: Emma is an aging ballet star whose career has reached its peak. Deedee is her friend who abandoned her career many years ago for marriage and motherhood. The two are reunited when Deedee’s daughter shows real promise of becoming an outstanding ballerina. Stars Anne Bancroft and Shirley MacLaine with Tom Skerritt, Mikhail Baryshnikov, Leslie Browne, Martha Scott, Anthony Zerbe, supported by the American Ballet Theater and featuring the Los Angeles Philharmonic Orchestra.
